Carousel.title0: We have been with you for over 20 years!
Carousel.subtitle0: We strive to make our big world a little smaller and closer by means of communication.
Carousel.subtitle1: Understanding that each business is conducted in its own way, we assess your requirements and needs and offer individual solutions.
Carousel.subtitle2: Rates change depending on how long and firmly we cooperate with you.
Carousel.subtitle3: We will help develop efficient and convenient directions and schemes for transporting your cargo.

AboutUs.lineOne: To develop freight forwarding and transportation and make services accessible to everyone not only in Kyrgyzstan but also beyond the country's borders. We strive to help your business grow more efficiently through fast, reliable, and cost-effective delivery of your goods.
AboutUs.lineTwo: We were founded in July 2000. To this day, the Company is one of the largest international freight forwarders in Kyrgyzstan.
AboutUs.lineThree: The company is a declared forwarder of the State Enterprise 'NC 'Kyrgyz Temir Jolu'.
AboutUs.lineFour: Co-founders of the Kyrgyz Freight Forwarders Association
AboutUs.lineFive: Over 10 years of cooperation with the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA)
AboutUs.lineSix: We are a member of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Kyrgyz Republic
AboutUs.lineSeven: Winners of the 'Choice of the Year' award in 2004, 2005, 2011

Services.description: Freight forwarding with an individual approach to each client is our main principle, which the entire team of Transsystem-Bishkek LLC follows.
Services.lineOne: We can help you organize transport and forwarding services upon your request:
Services.lineTwo: Railway transportation across the territories of the CIS and Baltic countries
Services.lineThree: Mixed, combined, multimodal transportation of various types of cargo
Services.lineFour: Delivery of passenger cars by rail.
Services.lineFive: Additional range of transport and forwarding services
Services.lineSix: We will calculate the rates and cost of transportation quickly and absolutely free!
Services.lineSeven: We have exceptional rates in Kyrgyzstan and Kazakhstan!

ServiceCalculation.description: The cost of freight transportation services by rail consists of several components:
ServiceCalculation.componentOne: international railway tariff + security services + forwarding commission.
ServiceCalculation.note: The above cost of services depends on many variables, such as:

cargoCode.title: Cargo Code
cargoCode.note: What type of cargo are you going to transport

rollingStockType.title: Type of Rolling Stock
rollingStockType.note: Wagon, container, open-top wagon, platform, etc.

contactInfo.title: Phone number or email
contactInfo.note: Please provide your contact details so that we can reach you
contactInfo.warning: Without this information, we cannot contact you

ServiceCalculation.feedbackMessage: You will be contacted shortly. Thank you!

Common.address: Address: Kyrgyz Republic, Bishkek, Razzakova Street, 15
